msbt.message: Hey, weird question, butyou wanna get involved in a treasure hunt with me?
Oh yeah!
Maybe later.
My brain's a-stormin' and I just had an idea. Wanna do a treasure hunt?
Yeah!
I don't think I can.
What would you do if you had a little extra time?<10_4 /> Treasure hunt, right? C'mon, kiddo!
OK!
Sorry, I'm busy.
Alright! I'll get my shovel and get to diggin'. That's rightâ€” I'm hidin' the treasure!
Roger that! Just gimme a few minutes to bury the thing
Ha! Knew you were a good sport, kiddo. I'll go get things ready for you
Aw, crud. Just realized I don't have time to do this now. Sorry, kiddo.
No deal, huh? Well, maybe another time.
Not interested, eh? Maybe some other time!
No? I was sure you'd go for it. Ah, well. Let's do it another time!

Alright, here's how this thing is gonna work, <10_7 arg="60" />If you can find the treasure I hid before the time's upyou get the treasure! It's yours!<10_7 arg="120" /> I buried it in the ground somewhere, so there's no need to go snoopin' around inside buildings.<10_7 arg="120" /> Giddyup!<10_7 arg="90" />

OK then, here's the rules!<10_7 arg="60" />If you can find the treasure I buried before time runs out, you win and the treasure's yours, !<10_7 arg="120" /> It's buried outside, so don't bother lookin' around inside anywhere!<10_7 arg="120" />And just so we're clear, the only one who can dig up that treasure is you, OK? This is between you and me!<10_7 arg="120" />Alright, off you go then!<10_7 arg="90" />

Alright, here's how this thing is gonna work.<10_7 arg="90" />It's pretty simple. I put a treasure in the ground. You just gotta find it before the time's up, and it's yours!<10_7 arg="120" /> Nowwhat are you waitin' for? Time's a-wastin', !<10_7 arg="90" />

OK then, here's the rules!<10_7 arg="90" />This ain't hard. I buried a treasure out there somewhere. If you find it before time's up, it's all yours!<10_7 arg="120" /> It's buried outside, so no need to go pokin' around inside anyplace.<10_7 arg="120" />And just so we're clear, the only one who can dig up that treasure is you, OK? This is between you and me!<10_7 arg="120" />There's not a lot of time this time around, so you better be quick! Alright, off you go, !<10_7 arg="120" />
Hey, uhneed a refresher on the rules?
Please!
No, thanks.
Alrightoff you go, !<10_7 arg="90" />
Dunno if it needs to be said, but this here's a one-on-one match. Your buddies can't help you look!<10_7 arg="120" /> Alright, off you go, !<10_7 arg="90" />
Alright, then. You better hurry up! Ain't much time, !<10_7 arg="90" />

Dunno if it needs to be said, but this here's a one-on-one match. Your buddies can't help you look!<10_7 arg="120" /> There ain't a lot of time this go-round, so be quick about it! Alright, off we go, !<10_7 arg="120" />
Good timin', kiddo. Interested in findin' someTREASURE?!
I AM interested.
I'll pass.

Wonderin' what's on my mind, eh? Well, allow me to shareI was just thinkin'if I were a pirate, where would I hide my treasure? Now, for legal reasons, I have to state clearly that I'm not a real pirate, . With that outta the way, wanna go lookin' for some buried treasure?
I'm in!
Maybe another time.
Sorry, kiddo. I'm strictly a daytime pirate when it comes to treasure huntin'. Maybe another time.
Yarrr! Just gimme a few minutes to bury this treasure and you can get to piratin'!
No go on the piratin', huh? Well, maybe some other time.
Ah, nuts. We spent too much time yakkin' about buried treasure to actually go through with it. Let's try again sometime.
Giddyup! I've got just the spot picked out
Alrighty. Guess I'll have to get my piratin' fix elsewhere. Maybe another time. Gahaha!
Wait a sec Now that I look around, there ain't a good spot on the island left where I can bury this treasure. We can't do a treasure hunt like this. Sorry for bringin' the whole thing up.
